description: The schema representation of a badge class
title: Badge Class

___criteria.description: URL of the criteria for earning the achievement. If the badge represents an educational achievement, consider marking up this up with LRMI

___description.description: A short description of the achievement.

___issuer.description: URL of the organization that issued the badge. Endpoint should be an IssuerOrganization

___tags.description: List of tags that describe the type of achievement.

___image.description: URL of an image representing the achievement.

___alignment.description: List of objects describing which educational standards this badge aligns to, if any.
